profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

Our service areas include and are not limited to;

profile: Mold Detection & Removal If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your family’s health and well-being. At mri-mold.ca it’s our job to ensure you are provided with an accurate assessment and appropriate resolution to maintain a safe and healthy environment.

Toronto and the GTA
Brampton, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Markham, Newmarket, Whitby, Ajax, Pickering, Oshawa, Mississauga, King City, Vaughan, Concord, Oakville, Milton and Caledon, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph

specialities: Researching and employing the most up to date mold remediation practices in the industry. In addition, we have been assisting in the remediation of imported sea containers, sailboats/power boats and Condo/Apartment heating/cooling unit remediation.

profile:
PuroClean Canada is a leader in providing complete services in mold detection & removal.  Our expertise in property damage emergencies, helps families and businesses overcome the devastating setbacks caused by water, fire, mold and other conditions resulting in property loss.

Our understanding and compassion during the recovery process has earned PuroClean the reputation of being known as “The Paramedics of Property Damage™" and a provider of choice for insurance professionals and property owners throughout Canada and the United States.  We pledge to do whatever it takes to respond, restore and rescue properties in all of the communities we serve.
service_area: Ontario & Alberta, BC Lower Mainland, BC Fraser Valley
services:
1. Water Damager Restoration:
 
Our trained professionals identify the full extent of water damage, both obvious and unseen, by using moisture sensors and detectors. This ensures that a thorough remediation and cleanup within the damaged property is always completed, no matter the size of the  water emergency project. 
 
Some examples of the water damage services handled by PuroClean are: Flooded Basements, Sump pump failure, Sewer backup, Cracks in the foundation leading to seepage and many more incidents where water has damaged your home or property. 
 
2. Fire Damage Restoration: 
 
As property owners, we understand how devastating a fire can be, which is why we take the time to walk each owner through every step of the restoration process.
 
Our main goal is to meet the needs of the customer and ensure that their mind is at ease throughout the entire process. We determine the full extent of the fire damage, including the impact of smoke, heat and residues from fire and smoke. 
 
It is essential that we provide open communication with the property owner, ensuring that they are fully aware of what will be taking place in their home following this unexpected loss. 
 
PuroClean is determined in their processes to prevent replacement costs that reduce overall expenditures, saving the property owner money wherever possible. 


3. Mould Inspection and Mitigation:
 
When it comes to a property that has been affected by Mould we use environmentally friendly cleaning agents, a botanical spray and a hydroxyl to ensure that the infected area has been completely sanitized and cleansed. 
 
Through this multifaceted process, mould spores are captured and killed, leaving behind a clean area and fresh scent. Whether your property has been affected by Attic Mould,  Mould in the Kitchen, Basement Mould or any other kind of mould in your home or property the Paramedics of Property Damage are your trusted restoration specialists. 
 
4. Biohazard & Trauma Cleanup: 
 
In your time of need, let our professional technicians take care of you and your family, providing you peace of mind. 
 
Our services will be professionally completed and your space and belongings handled with care. 
 
We offer the following Biohazard clean ups: Blood and Bodily fluid cleanup, Suicide and Homicide Cleanup, Accidental Death Clean up, Sewage Cleanup and Sanitation Services, Rodent and Bird Feces Cleanup Services and Hoarding Cleanup Services.
diplomas: IICRC Certification: ASD, WRT, FSRT, AMRT
name: Puro Clean Of Greater Toronto Area

profile:
*Please note if you are seeking emergency services for Water Damage, Fire Damage  or Biohazard mitigation - please call the phone number rather than leaving a message in the inbox* 

PuroClean Emergency Services is independently owned and operated in Oakville Ontario servicing both Oakville and Mississauga. We treat your property as we would our own. We take the time to communicate and explain our procedures and the results  you can realistically expect. We do whatever it takes to ensure your completely satisfied with our service.  With extensive experience and training in property restoration backed by IICRC/ Clean Trust certifications, PuroClean has earned a reputation as "The Paramedics of Property Damage". We do more than clean up after a property disaster. In response to every emergency, we provide a combination of exceptional property mitigation services delivered with an equal degree of compassion. We help rescue homes. We put businesses back on their feet. We help you get back to your life.
service_area:
Ontario:
Based in Oakville, Serving Oakville, Mississauga,Halton,Peel, Clarkson,Lorne Park
products:
State of the art drying systems, Deodorization, Water Removal, Cleaning, Disinfecting and Repairs to Property.
Catalogue of damaged contents and off site storage of contents.
services:
1. Water Damage Restoration: Our trained professionals identify the full extent of Water Damage, both obvious and unseen, by using moisture sensors and detectors. This ensures that a thorough remediation and cleanup within the damaged property is always completed, no matter the size of the water emergency project. 

Some examples of the water damage services handled by PuroClean are: 
•	Basement Flooding
•	Sump Pump Failure
•	Sewer backup 
•	Seepage 
•	Kitchen Flood 
•      Water Damage in Basement 

2.  Fire Damage Restoration: As property owners, we understand how devastating a fire can be, which is why we take the time to walk each owner through every step of the restoration process. We determine the full extent of the fire damage, including the impact of smoke, heat and residues from fire and smoke. It is essential that we provide open communication with the property owner, ensuring that they are fully aware of what will be taking place in their home following this unexpected loss. 

Some examples of the Fire Damage services are: 
•	Smoke Damage Cleanup
•      Soot Cleanup 
•	Fire Damage Cleanup
•	Fire Damage Mitigation
•	Smoke Damage Mitigation  

3. Mould Inspection and Mitigation: When it comes to a property that has been affected by Mould we use environmentally friendly cleaning agents, a botanical spray and a hydroxyl to ensure that the infected area has been completely sanitized and cleansed. Through this process, mould spores are captured and killed, leaving behind a clean area and fresh scent. 

Mould Removal services offered by PuroClean are: 
•	Attic Mould Removal
•	Kitchen Mould Removal
•	Bathroom Mould Removal
•	Basement Mould Removal or the 
mitigation of any other kind of Mould on your property.

4. Biohazard & Trauma Cleanup: In your time of need, let our professional technicians take care of you and your family, providing you peace of mind. Our services will be professionally completed and your space and belongings handled with care. 

We offer the following Biohazard clean ups: 
•	Blood and Bodily Fluid Cleanup
•	Suicide and Homicide Cleanup
•	Accidental Death Clean up
•	Sewage Cleanup and Sanitation Services, 
•	Rodent and Bird Feces Cleanup Services 
•	Hoarding Cleanup Services

profile:
At Shield Restoration, we understand you didn’t plan for this damage and it’s now thrown off your daily life. Our Emergency team responds quickly both in the GTA and NOW we have an office in the south end of Barrie, to help prevent further water damage, expedite disaster clean up or fire restoration. We ensure the work is done according to the standard of care and save as much of your content as possible. The faster we remove the damage and restore your home, the quicker you will forget this every happened.

Collaboration with you, your insurance carrier and broker ensures everyone is on the same page. Our priority is always YOU and YOUR PROPERTY. Our Promise is excellence in customer service, taking the time to clean and restore your property to meet or exceed your expectations. All our work is guaranteed for as long as you own your home!


Shield Restoration takes pride in our ability to work collaboratively with our insurance partners.

We are have both preferred relationships with several carriers and work very well with all Insurance companies.

Our key to success is the understanding that we all have a role to play in the successful remediation and restoration of any insurance claim.

Our quick response, cause of loss reporting and our use of DASH software to track our workflow, allows for ease of communication with both adjusters and homeowners.

Our promise is to avoid surprises for all parties with heightened communication and continued updating of the progress of each project.

When we share a client, as an insurance adjuster you can be reassured that we are here to help you and the insured with our boutique-like service and collaborative approach.
services:
Residential and Commercial Restoration
Water Damage
Wind Damage
Fire Damage
Mould Damage
specialities:
At Shield Restoration, we stand by our work. We collaborate with you to ensure that you understand what the plan is for repairing your home. We help you with the selection process for flooring, paints and more. You can be involved in this process as much or as little as you would like. Before we finish, we require your stamp of approval that you are satisfied with our work.

We guarantee* our work as part of our partnership with your insurance company and match their expectation for guarantees. In addition, for non-insurance losses, we will guarantee* our work for as long as you own your home!

Any damage as a result of any future loss cannot be guaranteed.
Visit our website to calculate your POWER CONSUMPTION

profile:
Fixall Restoration is a locally owned and operated disaster restoration company located in Etobicoke. Although our office is in Etobicoke, our restoration professionals operate in all Greater Toronto Area, including Vaughan,  Mississauga, Brampton, Markham, etc.

We clean and restore properties damaged from flood, fire, smoke, mold. Our team is certified and licensed in the emergency restoration field.

We also have lots of experience in the restoration field in houses and businesses all around GTA and northern Ontario.

Our responsibility is to inform and communicate with you about all cleaning and restoration procedures we follow. Also we are here to answer any other questions you might have for us. We offer restoration services 24/7 according to your needs.

profile: #1 RATED WATER DAMAGE RESTORATION COMPANY IN ONTARIO Call us today at 647-886-8442 Rapidcan provides professional service in water damage restoration, mold removal, fire damage cleanup and roofing. We offer 24/7 emergency service and respond to your home or business within 45 minutes in case of an emergency. Call us at any time to arrange for a free consultation and estimate. Rapidcan is a certified firm by the IICRC and is a member of many restoration associations. We work closely together with you in repairing your residential or commercial location in a timely fashion. Rapidcan has been around since 2010. Before the inception of Rapidcan, one of the owners operated a successful contracting company for over 10 years. The other owner was a senior property manager with the largest condominium property management company in Canada. Together they pulled together their knowledge and resources to create a company of unmatched service. Rapidcan looks at each and every job from the clients point of view. We understand the complexities that come with disaster and restoration and make it our goal to make the process a smooth one. Call us today at 647-886-8442 Flood Damage Toronto Thank you for visiting our page.
